Notes: A flower which Yoshi can grapple with his tongue to swing himself in its direction.

Obj_arg0.Name: Fixed Rotation
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, the rotation of the grapple won't change. This lets you set the direction Yoshi swings in.

Obj_arg1.Name: No shadow
Obj_arg1.Description: If checked, the object doesn't cast a shadow.
